examples.example: 我终于通过努力拥有了属于自己的房子，内心无比喜悦。

translate.english: I finally have my own house through hard work, and I feel extremely joyful in my heart.

examples.example: 我梦想有一天能拥有一套宽敞明亮的房子，和家人一起幸福地生活。

translate.english: I dream of one day owning a spacious and bright house and living happily with my family.

examples.example: 我买了一套心仪的房子，开启了幸福生活的新篇章。

translate.english: I bought a favorite house and opened a new chapter of happy life.
